name: Lucifer's wrath
description: Welcome to hell, this is where the worst of the worst end up. Where the darkness reigns supreme and demons tortured damned souls for all of eternity. You've been sent to hell after your death sentence, little did you know that even after you died you'd still be behind bars. You've hatched a plan to get out of here however, and you're willing to annihilate everything in your path to make it come true. Are you ready for the ride of a lifetime?
